pageContext.claim: “Democrats are blocking additional funding for the popular Paycheck Protection Program. They are killing American small businesses. Stop playing politics Dems! Support Refilling PPP NOW – it is out of funds!”
pageContext.analysis: Democrats blocked additional funding for the PPP in an effort to include additional funding for other programs that are in desperate needs of funds. Moreover, several hundred publicly traded companies accessed the first round of PPP funding — not small businesses.
